pages.text: wayum'did'kum bi-amwalin wabanina wayajʿal lakum jannatin wayajʿal lakum anharan
ma lakum la tarjuna lillahi waqaran
alam taraw kayfa khalaqa l-lahu sabʿa samawatin tibaqan
wajaʿala l-qamara fihinna nuran wajaʿala l-shamsa sirajan
qala nuhun rabbi innahum ʿasawni wa-ittabaʿu man lam yazid'hu maluhu wawaladuhu illa khasaran
waqalu la tadharunna alihatakum wala tadharunna waddan wala suwaʿan wala yaghutha wayaʿuqa wanasran
waqad adallu kathiran wala tazidi l-zalimina illa dalalan
mimma khatiatihim ugh'riqu fa-ud'khilu naran falam yajidu lahum min duni l-lahi ansaran
waqala nuhun rabbi la tadhar ʿala l-ardi mina l-kafirina dayyaran
innaka in tadharhum yudillu ʿibadaka wala yalidu illa fajiran kaffaran
rabbi igh'fir li waliwalidayya waliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan walil'mu'minina wal-mu'minati wala tazidi l-zalimina illa tabaran
